label: clinical_signal_03_dx_renal_biomarker_study_020
content:
## 2024-07-15 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 86
- Active: 75
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 41
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 11

- 10mg

- 25mg
  - Enrolled: 20
- 50mg
  - Enrolled: 22
- 100mg

- NGAL Dose Correlation (r): 0.386
- eGFR Dose Correlation (r): -0.209
- UACR Dose Correlation (r): 0.43

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: RB-AE-2007, Description: back pain, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 50mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-2072, Description: hyperkalemia, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 25mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-2020, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 50mg
- AE ID: RB-AE-2035, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: not related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 25mg

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: RB-PD-2047, Description: Lab kit expired, replacement used, Severity: moderate
- PD ID: RB-PD-2050, Description: GFR measurement repeated due to hemolyzed sample, Severity: minor

### Events
- Lab kit resupply dispatched to sites with low inventory
- Central lab urine biomarker batch analysis completed for Week 20
- eCRF query resolution: 24 queries closed this week

### Notes
- Week 20: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 86 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
